Literature Review: Player tracking data in sports has revolutionized the way we analyze and understand player performance, team strategy, and game outcomes. The increasing availability of high-resolution spatiotemporal data has led to the development of novel statistical and machine learning approaches to extract valuable insights from these data. This review aims to provide an overview of the key methodological contributions in the field of player tracking data in sports, highlighting the potential applications and challenges associated with its use.
